subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: Runs a metro application given a codebase uri. Normally the metro command is invoked by the DPML Station as a result of a application start request or as a consequence of station startup. The metro application will continue until explicitly terminated.
subsection.source:
Description:
Deploys a component referenced by a part uri.
Usage: metro [-command] [-debug | -trace] [-D<name>=<value>] <uri> | -help | -version
Arguments: <uri> uri referencing a part datatype
Options: -debug enables debug level logging -trace enables trace level logging -D<name>=<value> declaration of one or more system properties -command enables command execution mode -help list command help and exit -version list version info and exit
DPML Metro Version @VERSION@ Copyright 2005-2007 Stephen J. McConnell Digital Product Management Laboratory
